channel.title: [PI] what file do i edit your prayer against certain npcs?
channel.description: like i am wondering say king black dragon attacks with magic, how do i edit so if a person has like prayer mage on it doesnt hit them?

item.title: [PI] what file do i edit your prayer against certain npcs?

item.description:
@Adominate-Pkz wrote:

no i want it so if you use prayer you can pray from it but it will hit lower obviously.
